comments.body:
This logic doesn't look right to me-- won't the message box pop up always with this change?

Should be something like:

```
fServer = GetBoolArg("-server");
#if defined(WIN32) && defined(QT_GUI)
... messageBox(ignoring....)
fServer = false;
#endif
```
